trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Barrie
There were no other sightings in Barrie on or around July 14th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were sitting outside watching the sunset...We have a beautiful western view of the hills...We stood up to go inside, and he said, "Wow Lyn, look at that bright light... At first we thought it was a plane, but there was no sound, and we realized that the light was an orange colour,and surrounding the object, not out in front like a plane... We followed it around our property and watched it float overhead...We both realized that we have never seen anything like it.. We also heard our nearest neighbour yelling to someone to "come outside"... It made no sound whatsoever and continued at a steady pace until it was out of view...
Summary: Oval shape,very bright light yellow/orange-/blinking lights on top.
